name: Allergies and Intollerances Lens
description: A lens that highlight any information related to allergies or intollerances
title: Allergies and Intollerance Lens

name: Contact lens
description: Lens that adds clickable contact links (email/phone) from the patient's healthcare provider information
title: Contact Info Lens

name: Diabetes lens
description: Lens that highlight diabetes related information
title: diabetes-lens

name: Doping lens
description: Lens that highlights doping-related information for professional athletes when the medication contains WADA prohibited substances
title: doping-lens

name: High Risk Medication Lens
description: A lens that adds safety questionnaire links for high-risk medications that may cause serious side effects
title: Questionnaire Lens

name: Interaction Lens
description: A lens that highlight any information related to interactions between other mediciones or ePIs
title: Interaction Lens

name: Laboratory results Interaction lens
description: Lens that highlights renal dose adjustment information when patient has low eGFR (< 30) laboratory results
title: lab-lens

name: Pregnancy lens
description: Lens that highlight or collapses pregnancy related information
title: pregnancy-lens

name: QT prolongation lens
description: Lens that highlights QT prolongation risk information when patient is taking Citalopram and has low potassium levels
title: qt-prolongation-lens

name: Support Material Lens
description: Lens that aplies RMM to a leaflet
title: Risk Minimization Material
